description.zh-cn: 18世纪苏格兰哲学家、经济学家，被誉为“经济学之父”或“资本主义之父”。
description.en: An 18th-century Scottish philosopher and economist, hailed as 'The Father of Economics' or 'The Father of Capitalism'.

nodes.id: 牛津大学贝利奥尔学院

zh-cn: 牛津大学贝利奥尔学院

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰哲学家，亚当·斯密在格拉斯哥大学的老师。
description.en: Scottish philosopher, Adam Smith's professor at the University of Glasgow.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰启蒙运动时期的哲学家、经济学家和历史学家，亚当·斯密的挚友。
description.en: A Scottish Enlightenment philosopher, economist, and historian, and a close friend of Adam Smith.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密于1759年出版的哲学著作，主要阐述了道德情感和同情心的作用。
description.en: A philosophical work by Adam Smith, published in 1759, which primarily discusses the role of moral sentiments and sympathy.

nodes.id: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

zh-cn: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究
en: An Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密于1776年出版的经济学著作，被认为是现代经济学的开山之作。
description.en: An economics work by Adam Smith, published in 1776, considered the foundational text of modern economics.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪至19世纪初发生在苏格兰的一场知识分子和科学成就的时期。
description.en: A period of intellectual and scientific accomplishments in Scotland from the 18th to the early 19th century.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，聘请亚当·斯密担任其继子亨利·斯科特的家庭教师。
description.en: A British politician who hired Adam Smith as a tutor for his stepson, Henry Scott.

nodes.id: 第三代巴克卢公爵亨利·斯科特

zh-cn: 第三代巴克卢公爵亨利·斯科特

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰贵族，亚当·斯密的学生。
description.en: A Scottish nobleman and student of Adam Smith.

description.zh-cn: 一种经济理论，认为国家财富取决于贵金属的积累，主张通过贸易保护主义增加出口、减少进口。
description.en: An economic theory that a nation's wealth depends on its accumulation of precious metals, advocating for protectionist policies to increase exports and reduce imports.

zh-cn: 古典自由市场经济理论

description.zh-cn: 18世纪末至19世纪中叶的经济学派，以亚当·斯密的《国富论》为起点。
description.en: A school of economic thought from the late 18th to the mid-19th century, starting with Adam Smith's 'The Wealth of Nations'.

description.zh-cn: 大卫·休谟的哲学著作，亚当·斯密在牛津大学期间曾阅读此书。
description.en: A philosophical work by David Hume, which Adam Smith read during his time at Oxford.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰哲学家，在亚当·斯密辞职后接替了他在格拉斯哥大学的教授职位。
description.en: A Scottish philosopher who succeeded Adam Smith as professor at the University of Glasgow after his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 法国启蒙运动时期的思想家、哲学家，亚当·斯密在欧陆游历期间曾与他会面。
description.en: A French Enlightenment writer and philosopher, whom Adam Smith met during his travels on the continent.

description.zh-cn: 法国经济学家，重农主义学派的领导人，亚当·斯密非常尊重他的理论。
description.en: A French economist and leader of the Physiocratic school, whose theories Adam Smith greatly respected.

description.zh-cn: 英国的科学学会，亚当·斯密于1773年入选为院士。
description.en: A learned society for science in the United Kingdom, of which Adam Smith was elected a Fellow in 1773.

description.zh-cn: 由塞缪尔·约翰逊主持的位于伦敦的餐饮俱乐部，亚当·斯密于1775年加入。
description.en: A London dining club hosted by Samuel Johnson, which Adam Smith joined in 1775.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰医生和化学家，亚当·斯密的好友及遗嘱执行人。
description.en: A Scottish physician and chemist, a close friend and executor of Adam Smith's will.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰地质学家，亚当·斯密的好友及遗嘱执行人。
description.en: A Scottish geologist, a close friend and executor of Adam Smith's will.

description.zh-cn: 由亚当·斯密、约瑟夫·布雷克和詹姆斯·赫顿在爱丁堡共同创立的俱乐部。
description.en: A club founded in Edinburgh by Adam Smith, Joseph Black, and James Hutton.

description.zh-cn: 大卫·休谟关于宗教哲学的著作，休谟曾请求亚当·斯密在其身后出版此书，但斯密拒绝了。
description.en: A work on the philosophy of religion by David Hume, who requested Adam Smith to publish it posthumously, a request Smith declined.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪的法国经济学派，认为国家财富唯一来源于土地农业，其观点被《国富论》所否定。
description.en: An 18th-century French economic school of thought that held that the wealth of nations was derived solely from the value of land agriculture, a view refuted in 'The Wealth of Nations'.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利经济学家，提出了“亚当·斯密问题”。
description.en: An Austrian economist who coined the term 'das Adam Smith-Problem'.

description.zh-cn: 关于亚当·斯密在《道德情操论》中强调的“同情”与在《国富论》中强调的“私利”之间是否存在矛盾的学术争论。
description.en: The academic debate over the apparent contradiction between the emphasis on 'sympathy' in Adam Smith's 'The Theory of Moral Sentiments' and 'self-interest' in 'The Wealth of Nations'.

description.zh-cn: 法国启蒙运动时期的思想家，其理论对亚当·斯密有所影响。
description.en: A French thinker during the Enlightenment whose theories influenced Adam Smith.

nodes.id: 托马斯·罗伯特·马尔萨斯

zh-cn: 托马斯·罗伯特·马尔萨斯

description.zh-cn: 1737年（大约14岁时），斯密进入格拉斯哥大学学习道德哲学。
description.en: In 1737 (around the age of 14), Smith entered the University of Glasgow to study moral philosophy.

relationships.target: 牛津大学贝利奥尔学院

description.zh-cn: 1740年，斯密获得斯内尔奖学金进入牛津大学贝利奥尔学院学习，并于1746年离开。
description.en: In 1740, Smith received the Snell Exhibition to study at Balliol College, Oxford, leaving in 1746.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密出生于苏格兰法夫郡的柯科迪。
description.en: Adam Smith was born in Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密在格拉斯哥大学时，在法兰西斯·哈奇森的教导下研读道德哲学，并深受其启发。
description.en: At the University of Glasgow, Adam Smith studied moral philosophy under the tutelage of Francis Hutcheson and was deeply inspired by him.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密与大卫·休谟在1748年左右相识，并迅速成为亲密的挚友。
description.en: Adam Smith and David Hume met around 1748 and quickly became close, lifelong friends.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密撰写并于1759年出版了《道德情操论》。
description.en: Adam Smith wrote and published 'The Theory of Moral Sentiments' in 1759.

relationships.target: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密撰写并于1776年出版了《国富论》。
description.en: Adam Smith wrote and published 'The Wealth of Nations' in 1776.

relationships.source: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

description.zh-cn: 《国富论》是对重商主义的经典反驳，奠定了古典自由市场经济理论的基础。
description.en: 'The Wealth of Nations' is the classic refutation of mercantilism and laid the foundation for classical free-market economic theory.

relationships.source: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

description.zh-cn: 《国富论》的出版奠定了古典经济学的基础，使其成为一门独立的学科。
description.en: The publication of 'The Wealth of Nations' laid the foundation for classical economics, establishing it as an independent discipline.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密是苏格兰启蒙运动的代表人物之一。
description.en: Adam Smith was one of the key figures of the Scottish Enlightenment.

description.zh-cn: 大卫·休谟是苏格兰启蒙运动的代表人物之一。
description.en: David Hume was one of the key figures of the Scottish Enlightenment.

description.zh-cn: 1763年底，查理·汤森聘请亚当·斯密担任其继子亨利·斯科特的私人家教。
description.en: In late 1763, Charles Townshend hired Adam Smith as a private tutor for his stepson, Henry Scott.

relationships.source: 第三代巴克卢公爵亨利·斯科特

description.zh-cn: 在1764至1766年间，亨利·斯科特是亚当·斯密的学生，由斯密担任其家庭教师并陪同游历欧洲。
description.en: Between 1764 and 1766, Henry Scott was Adam Smith's student, with Smith serving as his tutor and accompanying him on a tour of Europe.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密在牛津大学期间阅读了大卫·休谟的《人性论》，并因此受到训斥。
description.en: Adam Smith read David Hume's 'A Treatise of Human Nature' during his time at Oxford and was reprimanded for it.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密在巴黎结识了重农主义学派的领导人弗朗索瓦·魁奈，并极为尊重他的理论。
description.en: In Paris, Adam Smith met François Quesnay, the leader of the Physiocratic school, and held his theories in high regard.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密于1773年正式入选为英国皇家学会的院士。
description.en: Adam Smith was formally elected a Fellow of the Royal Society in 1773.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密于1775年加入了塞缪尔·约翰逊主持的文学俱乐部。
description.en: In 1775, Adam Smith joined The Club, a dining club hosted by Samuel Johnson.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密与好友约瑟夫·布雷克和詹姆斯·赫顿共同在爱丁堡创立了牡蛎俱乐部。
description.en: Adam Smith, along with his friends Joseph Black and James Hutton, co-founded the Oyster Club in Edinburgh.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·布雷克与好友亚当·斯密和詹姆斯·赫顿共同在爱丁堡创立了牡蛎俱乐部。
description.en: Joseph Black, along with his friends Adam Smith and James Hutton, co-founded the Oyster Club in Edinburgh.

description.zh-cn: 詹姆斯·赫顿与好友亚当·斯密和约瑟夫·布雷克共同在爱丁堡创立了牡蛎俱乐部。
description.en: James Hutton, along with his friends Adam Smith and Joseph Black, co-founded the Oyster Club in Edinburgh.

description.zh-cn: 大卫·休谟临终前曾请求亚当·斯密在他身后出版《自然宗教对话录》，但斯密出于对自身和休谟声誉的担忧而拒绝了。
description.en: Before his death, David Hume asked Adam Smith to publish 'Dialogues Concerning Natural Religion' posthumously, but Smith refused due to concerns for his own and Hume's reputation.

relationships.source: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

description.zh-cn: 《国富论》否定了重农主义学派对于土地是财富唯一来源的观点。
description.en: 'The Wealth of Nations' refuted the Physiocratic school's view that land was the sole source of wealth.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家约瑟夫·熊彼特将亚当·斯密两部主要著作之间看似的矛盾命名为“亚当·斯密问题”。
description.en: Economist Joseph Schumpeter named the apparent contradiction between Adam Smith's two major works 'das Adam Smith-Problem'.

description.zh-cn: 1764年，亚当·斯密辞去格拉斯哥大学教授职位，由托马斯·里德接替。
description.en: In 1764, Adam Smith resigned from his professorship at the University of Glasgow, and was succeeded by Thomas Reid.

description.zh-cn: 亚当·斯密的经济和哲学思想影响了美国开国先驱，并对美国革命的理念基础产生了影响。
description.en: Adam Smith's economic and philosophical ideas influenced the American Founding Fathers and had an impact on the ideological foundations of the American Revolution.

relationships.target: 托马斯·罗伯特·马尔萨斯

description.zh-cn: 托马斯·罗伯特·马尔萨斯等后来的经济学家将斯密的理论整合为古典经济学。
description.en: Later economists such as Thomas Robert Malthus integrated Smith's theories into what is now known as classical economics.

description.zh-cn: 大卫·李嘉图等后来的经济学家将斯密的理论整合为古典经济学。
description.en: Later economists such as David Ricardo integrated Smith's theories into what is now known as classical economics.

relationships.target: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

description.zh-cn: 一些人主张《国富论》的内容曾被修改以符合大卫·休谟等思想家的理论。
description.en: Some argue that the content of 'The Wealth of Nations' was altered to align with the theories of thinkers like David Hume.

relationships.target: 国民财富的性质和原因的研究

description.zh-cn: 一些人主张《国富论》的内容曾被修改以符合孟德斯鸠等思想家的理论。
description.en: Some argue that the content of 'The Wealth of Nations' was altered to align with the theories of thinkers like Montesquieu.
